CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 3, 1945, pg. 22, reads: "Hostesses - The Kay Hostesses were recently organized to plan entertainment for the veterans of Deshon Hospital. Events will be held the first and third Wednesdays at the Kay Club, beginning March 7.  The Misses Jean Hamilton, Anna Howard, Etta Evans, Doris Foggy [Foggie] and Thelma Morris will serve on the refreshment committee.  Miss Anna Kemp is president and Miss Thelma Morris is secretary.  Seated, left to right: Doris Foggy [Foggie], Clara Smith, Jean Hamilton, Anna Kemp, Thelma Morris and Anna Howard.  Standing, left to right: Hazel Boone, Essie Mae Williams, Helen Thomas, Beatrice Boone and Etta Evans. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: The Kay Hostesses, seated from left: Doris Foggie, Clara Smith, Jean Hamilton, Anna Kemp, Thelma Morris, and Anna Howard; standing: Hazel Boone, Essie Mae Williams, Helen Thomas, Beatrice Boone, and Etta Evans, posed around two tables in Kay Boys Club
